statements: SELECT * FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_status FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(total_amount), MAX(total_amount), MIN(total_amount) FROM customer_orders;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_total FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_total FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY customer_name ASC, order_date DESC;
SELECT status_id, order_id, status, updated_at FROM OrderStatus WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM CustomerOrders JOIN OrderStatus ON CustomerOrders.order_id = OrderStatus.order_id;
SELECT SUM(order_total) AS total_sales FROM CustomerOrders WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date) = 2022;
SELECT customer_name, status, updated_at FROM CustomerOrders JOIN OrderStatus ON CustomerOrders.order_id = OrderStatus.order_id WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_details ORDER BY quantity DESC, order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'shipped';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_status = 'delivered';
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_id, p.product_name, od.quantity FROM orders o JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY o.order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'pending';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT oi.order_item_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity FROM order_items oi JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, O.order_id, O.order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders O ON c.customer_id = O.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, quantity FROM OrderDetails WHERE order_id = 456;
SELECT order_id, status_date, status_description FROM OrderHistory WHERE status_description LIKE '%delivered%';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;

SELECT OrderDetails.order_id, Orders.order_date, Products.product_name, OrderDetails.quantity FROM OrderDetails JOIN Orders ON OrderDetails.order_id = Orders.order_id JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.product_id = Products.product_id;
